ygData.msgSnippet: Sunhawk realizes that close-range combat it useless. He returns fire as Megatron transforms, but sees the incoming blast. Sunhawk:  BEAST MODE! He goes to hawk

Sunhawk realizes that close-range combat it useless. 
He returns fire as Megatron transforms, but sees the
incoming blast.

Sunhawk:  BEAST MODE!

He goes to hawk mode and is barely able to dodge
around the blast.  He circles around and comes in from
behind hoping that in robot mode close range combat
will be easier.  At the last second he transforms back
and comes in with his energon sword.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron watches Sunhawk leap upward, drawing an
> energon sword, and 
> laughs, "Hah, foolish Maximal, what do you expect to
> hit with slow 
> moves like that?" He barrel rolls right; a blur
> cutting past the 
> Sunhawk in mid air avoiding the sword.
> 
> "Megatron, TERRORIZE!" Megatron transforms quickly,
> and hits the 
> ground diagonally on his feet, sliding for a few
> metres.
> 
> "You attack me like you want to throw away your
> life," Megatron 
> sneers, as he raises his plasma gun at Sunhawk.
> "Then die!" He fires 
> two plasma blasts in quick succession, and draws his
> energon bladed 
> alloy axe.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Sunhawk reconizes the bot on sight.
> > 
> > Sunhawk:  MEGATROOOOONNNN!
> > 
> > He rushes forward.  His energon sword comes out of
> > it's wrist compartment and ignites.  He jumps
> several
> > feet in the air meeting Megatron head-on and
> slashes
> > at his head.
> > 
> > OOC: In the unlikely event this is an extended
> battle
> > with the good guy (if Sunhawk qualifies) winning
> and
> > in the more unlikely event that this rpg is found
> by a
> > Mainframe employee and turned into a cartoon this
> > would probably be the part where they play "You
> got
> > the touch" or maybe in a minute or two "Dare".
> > 
> 
> 
>
